property.name: titleAlignment
property.label: Metric Title Alignment
property.description: Select the alignment for the metric title text. This setting applies to all metrics displayed in the component.

property.name: noOfMetricsToDisplay
property.label: Total Metrics
property.description: Select the total number of metrics to display with this component.

property.name: isBold
property.label: Bold Values
property.description: If checked, numeric values will appear bold for all metrics in this component.

property.name: title1
property.label: Metric 1 Title
property.description: Title displayed at the top of the metric. If empty, no title will be displayed.

property.name: fieldNameAPI1
property.label: Metric 1 Field API Name
property.description: API Name for the field containing data to be displayed.

property.name: metricLabel1
property.label: Metric 1 Label
property.description: Label displayed beneath the metric value.

property.name: iconName1
property.label: Metric 1 Icon
property.description: SLDS Icon to display to the right of the metric value.

property.name: iconHoverText1
property.label: Metric 1 Icon Tooltip
property.description: Text to display when a user hovers over the metric icon.

property.name: iconColor1
property.label: Metric 1 Icon Color 1
property.description: Hex color for the icon.

property.name: showLeftButton1
property.label: Show Metric 1 Link 1
property.description: Select to display link 1.

property.name: labelForLeftButton1
property.label: Metric 1 Link 1 Label
property.description: Label displayed for link 1.

property.name: urlForLeftButton1
property.label: Metric 1 Link 1 URL
property.description: URL to access when link 1 is clicked.

property.name: showRightButton1
property.label: Show Metric 1 Link 2
property.description: Select to display link 2.

property.name: labelForRightButton1
property.label: Metric 1 Link 2 Label
property.description: Label displayed for link 2.

property.name: urlForRightButton1
property.label: Metric 1 Link 2 URL
property.description: URL to access when link 2 is clicked.
